    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public boolean solve()
        Tries to solve the sudoku.
        Returns:
        Will return if the sudoku could be solved.

      • getField

        public int[][] getField()
        Will return the field.
        Returns:
        Will return int[][] field.

      • checkLegal

        public boolean checkLegal(int row,
                          int column,
                          int n)
        This method checks if the given number n is a valid entry into the coordinate row, column.
        Parameters:
        row - Represents rows 1 to 9.
        column - Represents columns 1 to 9.
        n - a given number between 1 to 9.
        Returns:
        Will return true if the number can be entered in the given location.

      • checkIfValuesOk

        public boolean checkIfValuesOk()
        Goes through the entire sudoku field to check if all entered numbers are valid. It will start in the top left corner and work down toward the lower right corner.
        Returns:
        Will return true if no illegal numbers are encountered.
